summary: This document is an email exchange between Lisa D. Hurd and Amanda Kirby discussing financial transactions related to Southern Financial and Southern Trust. The correspondence indicates a follow-up on missing information regarding funds and includes internal references to Deutsche Bank operations.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D. Hurd is communicating with Amanda Kirby regarding financial transactions.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is responding to Lisa D. Hurd about the status of funds related to Southern Financial.

connections.description: Both individuals work at Deutsche Bank and are discussing financial matters.

keyFacts: The email exchange discusses missing funds for Southern Financial.
Lisa D. Hurd requests information regarding a Deutsche Bank account.
Amanda Kirby mentions that funds for Southern Trust have been received, but not for Southern Financial.
The correspondence is classified as confidential and for internal use only.
